alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 3:55PM CDT until March 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PART OF SOUTHEAST NEBRASKA... * Affected Area...In Nebraska, Seward, Saline and Jefferson. * Winds...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 25 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly, exhibit extreme behavior and be very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
